name: A Cuboid's Tale
description:
In this game you play as a cuboid slime on a quest to create a ultra rare ring. You unlock new abilities as you progress to help you better manage the obstacles on this 3D-Platformer.

This game is a personal challenge/project  to help me learn game development. The challenge was to learn how to make a game within a one month time frame. Everything had to be custom made and this was the result.
